title: Broken Beginnings
description: Broken Beginnings is a heart-shattering novel where damages to the heart must be overcome before love can hold a chance at surviving. In the dead of the night, Chloe packs her bags and runs for a better life, heading west of Toronto in search of something better. When her car breaks down in a small mountain town, she is forced to trust Galen to help. A journeyman mechanic with a heart-stopping grin and deep blue eyes she could drown in offers her a safe place to stay while she tries to find herself. As she gets to know Galen, it becomes clear to her that his life is everything straight out of a fairytale. He has the perfect family, the perfect job and the perfect life. He is happy and his heart has never been damaged by the choices of others the way Chloe's has. Galen has not lost and loss is all Chloe knows. For Chloe, trust is rare. But for Galen, trust is natural. Never having seen a beaten heart like Chloe's, Galen is determined to break through the walls she holds in place to protect herself and prove that the world is not filled with pain, but that the happiness she dreams of is attainable.
author: Alannah Carbonneau
